name: Spikes (Krautbytes)
description:
Controls: 

I = Info 

1 / 2 = Diffrent music

 3 / M = Music off

K= Suicide    
Space = Increase level temporary by one 

W,A,S,D / Arrows = Move controls

The Game: 

- The goal is to get to the end of the game
- Some coloured blocks can kill you:
- Black if you're level 1
- Red if you're level 2
- Green if you're level 3

Get experience points and items to become stronger

Game made by Julian Röckl

All Rights reserved

Music:

Track1 - Fast Forward - audeeyah.de
Track2 - Rythm is a fool - audeeyah.de
